name: RURAL AND TRIBAL DEVELOPMENT ORGANISATION
briefDescription: Free Medical check-up camps in schools- About 600 school children were benefited with free medicines.ENT camp was held in Old- age Home and distributed free Hearing Aids to 20 inmates. Free books, note books were distributed to about 250 poor students. Blankets, woolen hand gloves, caps and foot ware distributed to 30 street dwellers. Planning to distribute School Bags to poor children in rural school.
